rules.name: Rule #1
rules.value: Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech will be tolerated.

rules.name: Rule #2
rules.value: No spam, do not include special characters in your username and you must have a correct profile picture, don't annoy VCs

rules.name: Rule #3
rules.value: No NSFW or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content.

rules.name: Rule #4
rules.value: No spam, do not include special characters in your username and you must have a correct profile picture, don't annoy VCs

rules.name: Rule #5
rules.value: If you see something against the rules or something that makes you feel unsafe, let staff know. We want this server to be a welcoming space!

rules.name: Rule #6
rules.value: No investment advice is allowed and in private message too

rules.name: Rule #9
rules.value: DM advertising is prohibed and you will be banned if you do so

rules.name: Rule #10
rules.value: Do not abuse of the bot

rules.name: Rule #11
rules.value: Respect Discord guidelines https://discord.com/guidelines and Discord terms https://discord.com/terms

rules.name: Rule #12
rules.value: No self promotion except in the channels made for that

rules.name: Rule #13
rules.value: Do not try to bypass the automoderation

rules.name: Rule #14
rules.value: Talk in the correct channel corresponding to your topic

rules.name: Rule #15
rules.value: Do not impede staff work and tasks by trolling or providing fake proofs

rules.name: Rule #16
rules.value: Do not practice impersonation of other members or people do not share or ask for personal information
